Note

Archon depends on Web3 1.0. This version of web3 is still in Beta so usage may change unexpectedly and/or bugs may arise until a stable version of Web3 1.0 is released.

archon - Ethereum Arbitration Standard APIÂ¶

Archon is a javascript library written to make it easy to interact with Arbitrable and Arbitrator contacts. In particular, Archon can be used to take care of a lot of the hash validation work that is part of the Evidence Standard (ERC ___).

Archon can be used with all Arbitrable and Arbitrator contracts that follow the ERC 792 standard and has the functionality to interact with all standardized methods.

To get up to speed on the standards please reference:

ERC 792 Arbitration Standard.

ERC ___ Evidence Standard

Implementation of an Arbitrable Contract.

Implementation of an Arbitrator Contract.
